events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back because of sizing problems.
The case has been assigned to our customer support specialist Alice to assist with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and still has the tags attached.
Thanks for the info! I’ve initiated the refund process. You should receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Great, thanks for your quick help! I appreciate how straightforward this refund process is.
Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Please check your bank account in the coming days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us again if you have any other questions or concerns.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
